record.jsxtip: Fires after the user changes the value of this date picker. Canceling this event prevents the change from occurring.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user types text in the date field and before the change is committed. Canceling this event prevents committing the input.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxreturntext: specifies the parsed date, in which case the input text is not parsed by the date format.
modifies the text entered by the user before it is parsed by the date format.
record.jsxtext: the text entered by the user.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the calendar is revealed.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.

record.jsxreturntext: specifies the year and month to display upon opening the calendar.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the calendar is hidden.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this date picker loses focus.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this date picker gains focus.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user right-clicks this date picker and before the bound context menu displays. Canceling this event prevents the menu from displaying.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxreturntext: use this field to override the default menu with an instance of jsx3.gui.Menu.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this date picker is removed from the DOM.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the parent of this date picker before it is removed from the DOM.
